text: Ben Hur is a 1907 American silent drama movie directed by Sidney Olcott and Frank Oakes RoseBen Hur and stars Herman Rottjer, William S. Hart, and Gene Gauntier. The movie is based on the 1880 novel, Ben-Hur: A Tale of the Christ by Lew Wallace. Another silent movie on the same subject was made in 1925 and two sound movies on the same subject were made in 1959 and 2016. ==Actors== *Herman Rottjer *William S.
